member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskType
member.summary: Contains values for the MaskType enumeration that has different set of mask characters combined to form a mask expression.

member.summary: Represents the basic regular expression mask elements.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskType.RegEx
member.summary: Represents the complex regular expression mask elements.

member.summary: Contains values for the InputValidationMode enumeration that determines input validation in the control.

member.summary: Perform validation on lost focus.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.InputValidationMode.KeyPress
member.summary: Perform validation on every key press.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskFormat
member.summary: Contains values for the MaskFormat enumeration that allows the Value property to hold the characters without prompt and literals by setting the ValueMaskFormat.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskFormat.ExcludePromptAndLiterals
member.summary: Excludes the prompt character and literals in value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskFormat.IncludeLiterals
member.summary: Includes only the literals in value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskFormat.IncludePrompt
member.summary: Includes only the prompt character in value.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskFormat.IncludePromptAndLiterals
member.summary: Includes the prompt character and literals in value.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskedTextResultHint
member.summary: Contains values for the MaskFormat enumeration that describes why the input character was rejected.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskedTextResultHint.AlphanumericCharacterExpected
member.summary: Operation failed. An input character was encountered that was not alphanumeric.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskedTextResultHint.DigitExpected
member.summary: Operation failed. An input character was encountered that was not a digit.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskedTextResultHint.LetterExpected
member.summary: Operation failed. An input character was encountered that was not a letter.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskedTextResultHint.SignedDigitExpected
member.summary: Operation failed. An input character was encountered that was not a signed digit.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.MaskedTextResultHint.UnavailableEditPosition
member.summary: Operation failed. There were not enough edit positions available to fulfill the request.

member.name: T:Syncfusion.XForms.MaskedEdit.SfMaskedEdit

members.member:
Gets a value indicating whether the masked edit has mask value or not.
XAMARIN-41662:[iOS] SfMaskedEdit does not accepts input while placing it inside a SfTextInputLayout.

Gets a value indicating whether the masked edit input view has password character or not.
XAMARIN-42509:[iOS] Inputs do not get masked properly when placing the MaskedEdit in TextInputLayout and set PasswordChar.
